page.title: 06Upper Chine School-Shanklin
page.content: {Upper Chine School}is 71 years old. It is a day school and boarding school for girls. The school grounds are 33 acres, there are 12 buildings, a swimming pool and tennis courts. The girls start when they are 7 and leave at 16 or 18. A lot of the girls fathers work on the mainland, a small number are foreign. The school is divided into three,{primary, middle {and high school.}There are about 24 girls in each class. They wear a blue uniform. The school has three libraries and its own church. The boarding girls are allowed out of school on Saturdays to go shopping.
